titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Commons in Parliament made September the 9th 1641
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker ..., and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: In this edition the first word, p. 2 is : law.
This proposal, drastically modifying the practices of the Church of England and forbidding sports on Sunday, was passed by the Commons as an ordinance but was rejected by the Lords.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
